subject: Missing Haptic Reactor
description_text:
Hello guys,

I have just received my order Order #SSN3538 from your side, the pedals
look really nice, however the Haptic Reactors are missing.

Down below you can find a photo with the box that was delivered today and
as you can see no haptic reactors to be seen.:(

Could you please send me the Haptic Reactors too?

Thank you,
Dragos.

conversations.body_text: Hi Dragos Nitu,  Our VAM or VAM Pro units are usually packaged separately and shipped independently. I will check the tracking number with our operations team and get back to you shortly.

Thanks a lot, waiting for your feedback.

Thanks,
Dragos.

s√¢m., 22 nov. 2025, 04:39 service@simsonn.com
Hi Dragos Nitu,    Here is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2532100709170642
